Title: The Watch
Plot: Jerry has dinner with his parents and Uncle Leo. Women, who's paying and the watch are all discussed. Elaine uses Kramer as "her boyfriend" in trying to fool her shrink. George gets Russell's address and tries to get the pilot reinstated. Jerry tries to buy back the watch. Outside her shrink's office, Elaine meets "Crazy" Joe, whom she begins to date.
GuestStars: Larry David, Barney Martin, Liz Sheridan, Bob Balaban, Len Lesser, Heidi Swedberg, Peter Crombie, Stephen McHattie, Jessica Lundy, Christopher Carroll, Lewis Dauber, Mimi Craven
